lead_paragraph: ZARUCKI--Rose. The Yeshiva University family is saddened by the passing of our longtime YU Guardian Rose Zarucki, of blessed memory, who established the Charles Szaja Zarucki Memorial Scholarship Fund at the Samuel H. Wang Yeshiva University High School for Girls in Queens, New York, and supported other YU projects. Heartfelt condolences are extended to her cherished daughters, Betsy Zarucki and Judith Zarucki, and the entire Zarucki family. May they be comforted among all who mourn for Zion and Jerusalem. Richard M. Joel, President, Yeshiva University Norman Lamm, President Emeritus 1/3
